query_content_en: Cut my hand with a knife yesterday, skin peeled back exposing the flesh. Rinsed with water immediately. I faint at the sight of blood, so my husband applied a band-aid. Today I washed my face, brushed my teeth, and cooked without significant pain. I want to replace the band-aid. How long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 昨天手被刀划了，皮掀开能看见肉，第一时间用水冲洗。我本人晕血，让老公帮忙帖了创可贴今天正常洗漱做饭，无明显疼痛感，想换一片新的创可贴，手现在这样了，请问几天能好？

responses.content_en: It will likely take a few weeks to heal. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要几周。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: It’s been half a month and I still can’t bend it. How serious is this wound, and how much will it scar?
query_title_zh: 半个月了不能弯曲，请问这个伤口属于什么水平，会留多少疤啊

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Hand Surgery or Occupational Therapy specialist as it may be due to muscle stiffness but cannot exclude a tendon injury. It is difficult to say if this will scar as it depends on how the body heals.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看手外科或职业治疗专家，这可能是由于肌肉僵硬造成的，但不能排除肌腱损伤。很难说这是否会留下疤痕，因为这取决于身体的愈合情况。

query_title_en: After suturing the wound on my finger, it got infected and necrotic. Can anyone tell me if there is any hope for recovery?
query_title_zh: 手指外伤缝合后出现感染和肉坏死成这样了，麻烦帮看下这样还有救
query_content_en: After suturing the wound on my finger, it got infected and necrotic. Can anyone tell me if there is any hope for recovery?
query_content_zh: 手指外伤缝合后出现感染和肉坏死成这样了，麻烦帮看下这样还有救吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Hand Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist for further evaluation and possible debridement.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看手外科或整形外科专家进行进一步评估和可能的清创

query_title_en: Is there any hope for this severely damaged flesh?
query_title_zh: 肉烂成这样还有救吗
query_content_en: Is there any hope for this severely damaged flesh?
query_content_zh: 肉烂成这样还有救吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss scab removal and reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去找整形专科医生来看一下像植皮那样的祛疤和重建手术

query_content_en: A few days ago, I accidentally crushed my finger with a machine while working. The wound has been healing for over ten days. The fingertip feels a bit numb, and only hurts when pressed hard. Will this wound fully recover?
query_content_zh: 前些天 干活的时候 手指头不小心 被机器压了一下！ 现在伤口长了十几天了！ 现在感觉指头尖 有点没知觉！ 稍用力捏这个指尖 才有疼痛感 ！ 我这个伤口是不是不能完全恢复了？【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: This crush injury of the finger does not appear to be infected. Clean with soap and water. The nail may take 4-6 months to regrow. The numbness in the finger tip is likely due to trauma to the nerves in the finger tip. Sensation may return but will likely take months. Recommend Xray of the finger to assess for fracture.
responses.content_zh: 手指的挤压伤看起来没有感染。用肥皂和水清洗。指甲可能需要4到6个月才能重新长出。手指尖的麻木可能是由于指尖神经受到创伤。感觉可能会恢复，但可能需要几个月的时间。建议进行手指X光检查以评估是否有骨折。

query_title_en: There is redness at the scar. Is there any topical medication for relief? Can anyone give me a suggestion?
query_title_zh: 疤痕发红，擦什么药可以缓解？大神们支支招。

responses.content_en: You can try over the counter scar treatment gels and patches but I would recommend that you see a Dermatology specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 您可以尝试使用非处方的疤痕治疗凝胶和贴片，但我建议您咨询皮肤科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

query_title_en: How long will the wound take to heal?
query_title_zh: 这种伤口多长时间长好

responses.content_en: It may take months to heal.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要数月。

query_title_en: Details of the injury, a reminder for guys!
query_title_zh: 受伤过程，提醒路人！
query_content_en: I injured myself while riding my bike. I quickly went to a nearby small hospital for an X-ray. No bones were damaged, but I needed 13 stitches and had the stitches removed after ten days. I was feeling good about healing myself and didn't want to spend a lot of money at a big hospital, but in the end, I went to a large hospital with my family for better care.
query_content_zh: 骑车碰伤赶紧去附近小医院拍片，没伤到骨头就缝针13针掉针十天，感觉个人能看好，没合疗少花钱犹豫不决太信任小医院。最后还是进大医院连带家人陪

responses.content_en: This laceration is healed but the skin around the wound has been disrupted by an underlying blood clot below the skin. There are no signs of infection. The skin will slough over time.
responses.content_zh: 该裂伤已经愈合，但伤口周围的皮肤因皮下血块而受到影响。没有感染迹象。皮肤会随着时间逐渐脱落。

query_title_en: How should I treat a scrape wound from rollerboarding so that I don't damage it further or leave a scar?
query_title_zh: 玩滑板擦伤摔伤如何处理才可以不二次伤害不留疤？
query_content_en: The last time I got a scrape wound, I first covered it with Yun Nan Bai Yao powder and erythromycin, then wrapped it with two layers of gauze. Unfortunately, the gauze adhere to the wound the second day, and when I removed the dressing, I ripped off the scar. I painted some betadine afterward, and did not use any more gauze. The outer side of the thigh was covered by my pants, so the wound drainage also smeared to the pants. I covered it with gauze at night to sleep, and then the gauze adhere to the wound again. I did not tear down the dressing until the scar fell off. What should I do to avoid this? #wound#
query_content_zh: 上次擦伤后先上了云南白药粉和红霉素，然后用两层纱布包了一下，结果第二天纱布就和伤口粘在一起了，然后撕下来本来伤口干了结痂了又撕坏了。后来涂了碘酒，没用纱布，因为在大腿外侧正好在裤子里，渗出液和一些东西就粘到了裤子上。晚上睡觉包了纱布，然后纱布就又粘上了，这次没撕，直到结痂掉 应该如何避免这种情况？#外伤#

responses.content_en: Clean wound daily with soap and water and apply a dry dressing. If the dressing sticks to the wound apply saline to loosen gauze before removal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并使用干燥敷料。如果敷料粘在伤口上，可使用生理盐水润湿纱布以便移除。

query_title_en: It's been a few days since the scab formed from the fall. It's been three days, and it's still bleeding and oozing pus.
query_title_zh: 摔伤了几天结痂，3天了现在还流血流脓
query_content_en: It’s been a few days since the scab formed from the fall. It's been three days, and it's still bleeding and oozing pus. When I woke up this morning, I saw blood and pus everywhere. I have a tendency to develop scars, and even minor injuries take much longer to heal than they do for most people. My wounds are slow to heal. #wound#
query_content_zh: 摔伤了几天结痂，3天了现在还流血流脓，早上起来看流的到处都是，我是疤痕体质，只要受一点外伤都比普通人好得慢很多，很多，伤口不爱愈合#外伤#

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further treatment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去最近的急诊诊所进行进一步治疗。

query_title_en: Does anyone had nail removal before.
query_title_zh: 兄弟萌有没有拔过指甲的
query_content_en: I was caught by bike spokes. There is a horizontal irregular crack at the left midde finger nail. I went to the hospital for a nail removal ad suture. The recovered wound looks like this. How long will it take for the nail to fully grow back?
query_content_zh: 我五月三十号被自行车辐条别了一下，左手中指指甲横向不规则裂开，去医院做了拔甲跟甲床缝合，现在恢复成这个样子，指甲还有多久才能走完全长好

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6 months for a nail to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 指甲可能需要长达6个月的时间重新生长。

query_title_en: The scar on my arm fell off after being soaked in water. Inside the wound, there are yellow and white spottings. The spotting whitens and became larger after being soaked in water
query_title_zh: 手臂结痂泡水脱落  里面伤口有白黄色的点  泡水后变白变大

responses.content_en: Those are likely normal tissue that is still undergoing healing. There is no sign of infection at this time.
responses.content_zh: 这些可能是仍在愈合的正常组织。目前没有感染的迹象。

query_title_en: Seeking help from any experts! My ankle wound has healed, but it turned black.
query_title_zh: 请问一下专业的人士，我脚踝的这个伤口愈合了，但是颜色黑黑的
query_content_en: Could there be bruising inside, and what should I do it?
query_content_zh: 请问一下里面是否有淤血呢，需要怎么处理。

responses.content_en: Laceration has healed and surrounding skin appears viable. Darkening of skin likely resolving bruising from the time of trauma.
responses.content_zh: 撕裂部位已愈合、旁边的皮肤似乎亦已存活。皮肿变黑可能是受創时的瘀伤正在愈合所导致。

query_title_en: Finger pad separated from the flesh.
query_title_zh: 手指肚和肉分离
query_content_en: Got cut about 1cm deep by a knife along the nail bed, you can see the inside flesh. Should I cover it to let it heal or will new flesh grow? There was a lot of bleeding, and I stopped it with ash. Now it's covered with a band-aid. Will it heal?
query_content_zh: 被刀从指甲缝划开往里切了大概1cm，可以揭开看到里边的肉，贴上去能长好吗？还是重新长一块肉，当时从指甲缝流了好多血止不住就拿灰敷了，现在贴着创可贴，我想知道能长住吗

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear infected and the tissue of the fingertip appears viable. Clean ash off with soap and water and dress with dry dressing daily.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎未受感染，指尖上的组织似乎可以存活。用肥皂水把灰屑清理、之後用干包扎物每曰包扎好。

query_title_en: I fell off my bike and went to the campus clinic four or five times, but it still hasn't healed.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔伤了，去了校医院四五次还没好
query_content_en: My left leg seems to be infected. The doctor removed the scab. My right leg has a thick layer, but it's not entirely a scab. How long will this take to heal?
query_content_zh: 左腿应该是感染了，医生帮忙把结痂处去掉了。右腿不知道为什么有厚厚的一层，但不完全是结痂。这个要多久才能好呀？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Clean with soap and water daily and apply a dry dressing. It may take 2-4 months for the skin to completely cover the wound.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带覆盖。皮肤可能需要2到4个月才能完全覆盖伤口。

query_title_en: Feeling a bit anxious.
query_title_zh: 有点焦虑了
query_content_en: Two days ago, a piece of flesh was scratched off by something unknown. I only noticed when my hand got sticky after a long time. I wiped it with alcohol at that time, then applied iodophor and a band-aid the next day. I have to use a band-aid because of work, but the wound still has a layer of fluid. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 前天不知道被啥刮掉块肉，过了很久手黏了才发现，当时用酒精擦了下，第二天擦碘伏上邦迪了，这个位置我不得不用邦迪，不然影响工作，伤口一直这样，有层液体一样。请问该怎么办？

responses.content_en: The fluid is likely normal from the healing process. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 液体可能是因为愈合过程而正常。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_content_en: No bump or hit, but a mysterious wound appeared and is bleeding a bit. Can anyone help figure out what’s going on?
query_content_zh: 也没碰着撞着，莫名出现的伤口，有点流血。 有人帮忙看看是什么情况吗？

responses.content_en: It may be due to insect bites or dry skin leading to cracks and bleeding. If you are concerned, I would recommend that you see your Primary Care doctor for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于蚊虫叮咬或皮肤干燥导致的裂口和出血。如果您感到担忧，我建议您去看您的家庭医生进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Friends, help me determine if this wound is from a four-year-old's bite.
query_title_zh: 吧友们，帮忙看看这种伤口是不是一个四岁孩子咬的

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say how you sustained the wound but it does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 很难说伤口是怎么造成的的，但它似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带敷上。

query_title_en: Will this nail still grow?
query_title_zh: 这指甲还能长吗
query_content_en: Got hit, there was a bruise, cleaned it up with scissors and nails after it dried.
query_content_zh: 砸到了 有淤血 干了后剪刀指甲扣干净了

responses.content_en: If the nailbed was not damaged, the nail should grow back but it may take 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 如果指甲床没有受损，指甲应该会重新长出，但这可能需要6个月。

query_title_en: I fell off the bike last night in the rain.
query_title_zh: 昨天晚上下雨天骑电瓶摔了
query_content_en: I just removed a small black speck of dirt, but there's still some smaller bits inside. How should I do? Can I let it get wet in the shower? It doesn't seem very deep.
query_content_zh: 刚刚拿把一点黑色的小小个的脏东西搞了出来，现在里面还有点更小的，怎么处理，洗澡可以碰水吗，好像伤的不是很深

responses.content_en: You can allow soap and water to run over the area when showering or washing hands and gently try to remove the dirt. Then apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你可以在淋浴或洗手时让肥皂和水流过伤口区域，轻轻尝试去除污垢。然后涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带包扎。

query_title_en: I had a fall in November last year.
query_title_zh: 我上一年十一月份的时候摔伤
query_content_en: Other injuries healed in a month, but my index finger's second joint is still swollen. An X-ray showed nothing serious, and the doctor prescribed medication. The main issue now is it can't bend like the other fingers, hurts when twisting a bottle cap, and feels better after massaging. Should I see a traditional Chinese bone injury specialist?
query_content_zh: 其他伤一个月就好了，但是食指第二个关节肿起来到现在还没完全好，拍了x光，医生说没什么事的就开了药给我。现在主要症状是不能像其他手指那样弯曲，拧瓶盖会疼，在揉过之后会减轻，需要去看跌打吗

responses.content_en: You may have injured a tendon or ligament at the time of the injury, leading to scarring that may be limiting your finger mobility. I would recommend that you see a Hand Orthopedic specialist and/or Occupational Therapy for further evaluation. You are welcome to see a traditional Chinese bone injury specialist as well if you would like.
responses.content_zh: 你在受伤时可能伤到了肌腱或韧带，导致疤痕形成，这可能限制了你的手指活动。我建议你去看手部骨科专家或作业治疗师进行进一步检查。如果你愿意，也可以去看传统的中医骨伤专家。

query_title_en: It's been 2 months since I scabbed over a compression injury on the inside of my lower leg, and now the skin around the wound is damaged and bleeding. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 小腿内侧挤压伤去痂已经2个月了，现在伤口周围皮肤破损出血什么
query_content_en: The inner side of my lower leg got crushed, and it's been two months since the scab came off. Now, the skin around the wound is broken and bleeding. What's causing this? When I apply iodine, it stings, and it also stings during normal times. The middle of the wound doesn't hurt, though.
query_content_zh: 小腿内侧挤压伤去痂已经2个月了，现在伤口周围皮肤破损出血什么原因呢，破损出血的地方涂碘伏时会蛰疼平常也会蛰疼，中间伤口到不疼

responses.content_en: This is likely due to new blood vessel growth along the area. Avoid trauma such as scratching the area during the healing process and keep it clean, dry and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于该区域的新血管生长所致。在愈合过程中避免创伤，如抓挠该区域，并保持清洁、干燥，并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: Injury from falling off a bicycle
query_title_zh: 骑自行车摔伤
query_content_en: Fell off my bike, just applied hydrogen peroxide. Bro, how should I handle this?
query_content_zh: 骑车摔伤，刚上了双氧水。老哥嗯嘛怎么解决啊

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: Can anyone with experience help to see if this condition needs skin flap surgery
query_title_zh: 有经验的朋友帮忙看看这种情况是否需要皮瓣手术
query_content_en: The othropedic clinic doctor recommend to have it recover itselves slowly. Another doctor recommend the skin flap surgery. When the suture was removed,  there was some signs of dry crusting. There was a second infection after the suture removal, and the treatment took another half month. After the crusting dry skin was peeled off, the fingertip skin looks very thin. Then it looks very pink the second day.
query_content_zh: 门诊骨科医生说让自己慢慢恢复，有一个医生却说需要皮瓣手术才行。拆线时就已经有了干枯迹象，拆线后二次感染又有半个月左右的敞开治疗，撕掉干枯皮壳后指尖肉很薄，第二天就已经非常粉嫩。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery specialist to get another opinion regarding the skin flap.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您咨询整形外科专家，获取关于皮瓣的第二意见。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike yesterday.
query_title_zh: 昨天骑车摔的
query_content_en: Can I take a shower today with this condition?
query_content_zh: 这个情，今天能洗澡吗？

responses.content_en: You can take a shower and allow soap and water to run over the area. Then apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你可以淋浴，让肥皂和水流过伤口区域。然后涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带包扎。

query_title_en: Is the new nail growing back after my nail bed was cut and stitched up a fungal nail infection?
query_title_zh: 看下甲床被切掉又缝合了，新长出的指甲是不是灰指甲啊？
query_content_en: Why is the surface so uneven?
query_content_zh: 为什么坑坑洼洼的！

responses.content_en: It does appear that there is a new nail growing but there is no sign of a fungal infection.
responses.content_zh: 看起来确实有新指甲在生长，但没有真菌感染的迹象。

query_title_en: Second day of an abrasion. Is this infected or healing normally?
query_title_zh: 擦伤第二天，这是感染了还是正常恢复？

responses.content_en: If you have symptoms such as fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, pain, warmth, worsening redness or pus-like disharge at the wound, I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 如果你有发烧、寒战、恶心、呕吐、疼痛、伤口发热、红肿加重或有脓性分泌物等症状，我建议你去最近的紧急护理中心进行进一步检查。

query_title_en: Can muscle loss be repaired?
query_title_zh: 肌肉损失 缺失还可以修复吗？
query_content_en: It was a traffic accident. There was a foreign body penetrating vertically through back of my right thigh, and parts of the flesh was missing. The top later of the skin was sutured, so nothing can be seen from the superficial layer. Since I was only in my 10s, and that I am still growing in height, the missing part of the muscle mass has been constantly changing during devleopment, and eventually forming the dent you can see  now. I can walk properly, but the core strength was not stable. I will have pain if I walk for a long distance. My calves always have cramps.
query_content_zh: 是交通事故，异物垂直插入右大腿则后方，少了一块肉，当时把表面的皮肤缝合，表面看不出什么。因为当时才十几岁，身高还在发育，发育过程中肌肉缺失的地方一直在变化，最终形成现在的凹陷。可以正常行走，但重心不稳，长时间行走，会疼痛，小腿经常抽筋。

responses.content_en: Unfortunately if the wound has not changed after a year, it would be unlikely for it to remodel. You can see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss scar revision surgery.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口在一年后没有变化，重塑的可能性很小。您可以咨询整形外科专家，讨论疤痕修复手术。

query_title_en: The injury was caused by falling off a scooter.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔得伤
query_content_en: Could any experts tell me if this is inflammation and suppuration?
query_content_zh: 大神们请问我这个是发炎鼓脓了吗

responses.content_en: There is inflammation since the area around the wounds are red. If there is pus-like drainage from the wounds, then there is suppuration. Based on the photos, there does not appear to be suppuration.
responses.content_zh: 由于伤口周围发红，代表存在炎症。如果伤口有脓样分泌物，则代表有化脓。根据照片显示，目前似乎没有化脓现象。

query_title_en: Feels like it's festering.
query_title_zh: 感觉是化脓了。。
query_content_en: Fell off my bike three days ago, disinfected with hydrogen peroxide and iodophor at home, then applied the hospital’s emergency ointment, but it doesn’t seem to help.
query_content_zh: 骑车摔的，第三天，家里有双氧水碘伏就消毒了一下，然后涂的医院配的外用应急软膏，感觉没啥用

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluation as it appears the wound is infected and you may need additional treatment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去医院进一步检查，因为看起来伤口已经感染，可能需要额外的治疗。

query_title_en: It's been more than two months and it still hasn't healed.
query_title_zh: 两个月多了，还没有好

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看普通外科或整形外科专家进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Fell off an electric scooter a few days ago, got abrasions.
query_title_zh: 前几天骑电动车摔车了 #擦伤#
query_content_en: Can you check if this scab is normal? I went to the school clinic when I got injured; they disinfected it and gave me iodophor to apply twice daily. The injury is on my knee, so it's hard to go out and get a PCR test, and I can’t go to the hospital. (The first few photos are taken when I just got injured.)
query_content_zh: 请你们帮我看看这个结痂的情况是否正常？刚受伤的时候有去学校校医室检查了，他们帮我做了消毒，开了碘伏让我回家一天两次擦。因为伤在膝盖的位置，基本上出门很困难所以没法做核酸，就没办法去医院检查…..（前几张是刚受伤时候的照片）

responses.content_en: The wound is healing slowly and the scab appears to be normal. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily  and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在缓慢的愈合，皮肤看起来正常。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_content_en: Can someone tell me if my wound can heal on its own, or do I need a skin graft? I was hit by an electric bike on the side of my calf while walking, but at first, I didn’t think it was serious. Two days later, the wound turned black, so I went to the hospital for treatment. After about a week, I had an ultrasound debridement under anesthesia. It’s been a month now, and here are some pictures of the wound from the start until now. The wound is less than a centimeter wide, and I’ve been getting the treatment every three days at the wound care clinic. Because the health record is under burns and plastic department, two doctors keep saying that it won’t heal on its own and that I’ll need a skin graft. Even if it heals, they say I’ll have a scar, and wearing pants will hurt. I want to ask everyone if they are just exagerating the seriousness to make me get the surgery, or do I really need a skin graft?
query_content_zh:
求各位大佬给看看，我这个伤口能自己恢复好吗？必须植皮吗
是在走路时被电瓶车撞伤的小腿侧边，当然觉得问题不大没在意，两天后伤伤口发黑才去的医院处理，大概一周左右做了麻醉的超声清创，目前已经一个月，下面分别是刚受伤到目前的照片，伤口大概不到厘米.一直每三天在伤口治疗门诊换药.
因为需要病历挂了烧伤整形科，有两个医生从一开始就不停说我这个自己长不好必须要植皮，就算长好了也会留疤穿裤子也要磨着疼之类的，我想问问各位大佬他是故意说严重想让我植皮手术还是我这个就是必须植皮呢？

responses.content_en: A skin graft would allow the wound to heal faster but it is ultimately your decision if you would like to pursue it.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤移植可以让伤口愈合得更快，但最终是否进行取决于你的决定。

query_title_en: Will it heal?
query_title_zh: 还能恢复吗。
query_content_en: Parts was the skin was scraped out. It has been five months and nothing is changing. Will it return back to what it was before?
query_content_zh: 挂掉一块皮，已经已经五个月了，一直是这样，请问还能恢复到以前那样吗？

responses.content_en: Hypertrophic scars will soften over the course of a year. If cosemesis is a conern consult plastic surgery for scar revision.
responses.content_zh: 增生性瘢痕在一年内会软化。如果外观是个问题，请咨询整形外科进行瘢痕修复。

query_title_en: Please help, please help.
query_title_zh: 帮帮忙帮帮忙
query_content_en: A few days ago, I accidentally scraped off a layer of skin and used a bandage. Now there's something white and green in the middle of the wound. Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 前几天不小心擦掉了一层皮用止血贴包了，现在伤口中间有个白白绿绿的东西是不是化脓了啊

responses.content_en: There is no sign of infection at this time. The middle of the wound contains healing tissue. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 目前没有感染的迹象。伤口中央含有愈合组织。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Is this inflammed?
query_title_zh: 这是发炎了吗
query_content_en: I accidentally kicked the nail, and the whole toe nail ripped off. It has been two weeks, the wound is in extreme pain and oozing blood, is it infalmmed?
query_content_zh: 不小心踢到钉子，脚趾甲整个撕掉了，现在已经快两周了，伤口有剧烈疼痛和渗血，是发炎了吗？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as there may be an infection if you have continued pain and bleeding.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估，如果您持续感到疼痛和出血，可能存在感染的风险。

query_title_en: Finger got cut by a blade, disinfected with Iodophor and bandaged, woke up to a blackened wound, what should I do?
query_title_zh: 手指被刀片划伤，碘伏消毒后包了创口贴，一觉醒来伤口变黑，怎么办
query_content_en: Got cut by a razor while shaving, rinsed it with water, and disinfected with Iodophor.
query_content_zh: 刮胡子的刀片划伤，冲过水之后用碘伏消毒了

responses.content_en: Continue performing local wound care with washing area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你要继续用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抗生素药膏和用绑带缠好

query_title_en: Does this wound need stitches?
query_title_zh: 这伤口有必要缝合吗
query_content_en: Yesterday's wound has already turned yellow after a day.
query_content_zh: 昨天的伤口，已经过了一天了，伤口发黄

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for stitiches for proper healing and to evaluate the other wound to make sure there is no sign of an infection.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心缝合，以确保伤口能正确愈合，并评估其他伤口以确保没有感染迹象。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike, applied iodophor, and used a sterile dressing. Should I keep it covered?
query_title_zh: 骑车摔了，涂了碘伏然后贴了一个无菌敷贴，这样子还需要继续贴着
query_content_en: Fell off my bike, applied iodophor, and used a sterile dressing. Should I keep the sterile dressing on? The wound seems to be oozing pus or blood.
query_content_zh: 骑车摔了，涂了碘伏然后贴了一个无菌敷贴，这样子还需要继续贴着无菌敷贴吗，我看伤口好像在流脓还是流血

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and cover with dry dressing. The liquid is slightly bloody because it is a new wound. This will stop in a day or two. The wound is not infected at this time.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗并覆盖干燥的敷料。这个液体有点像血，因为这是一个新伤口。这将在一两天内停止。此时伤口没有感染。

query_title_en: Facial abrasion, below is the condition
query_title_zh: 面部擦伤 情况如下
query_content_en: I have a facial abrasion from riding on a vehicle. There are two small openings, and then a large abrasion site. Currently, I cleaned the wound with iodine, and applied batroban twice. Anyone please tell me when will it recover, and if it will leave a scar?
query_content_zh: 面部骑车擦伤了，有两个小口，然后有一大片擦伤痕迹，目前碘伏清洁过伤口，涂了两次百多邦，想问问各位老师什么时候能恢复，会不会留下疤痕

responses.content_en: It may take up to 4 weeks for recovery. It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as it depends how the body heals. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 恢复可能需要长达4周。很难说这是否会留下疤痕，因为这取决于身体如何愈合。请继续进行伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: My palm has been scraped for more than half a month, the wound is black and getting hard
query_title_zh: 手掌磕破半个多月了，伤口发黑发硬

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss removal of the scab.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看普通外科或整形外科专家，讨论去除结痂的问题。

query_title_en: Does this situation still require gauze bandaging?
query_title_zh: 这种情况还需要用纱布包扎吗？

responses.content_en: If the wound is dry and no longer bleeding or draining, you do not need to place gauze bandaging over it.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口干燥且不再出血或渗液，则无需在上面放置纱布。

query_title_en: Experts, I had stitches removed from this wound. When I lift my wrist, it feels tight. How long until I can move freely?
query_title_zh: 大佬们 这个伤口拆线了 上抬手腕有拉扯感 大概多久能自由活动呢
query_content_en: Firends, I had stitches removed. When I lift my wrist, it feels tight. How long until I can move freely?
query_content_zh: 大佬们 这个伤口拆线了 上抬手腕有拉扯感 大概多久能自由活动呢

responses.content_en: The scar from the laceration will continue remodel for 1-1.5 years after an injury. Over time the scar will cebome softer and smoother.
responses.content_zh: 裂伤的疤痕将在受伤后继续重塑1到1.5年。随着时间过去，疤痕会变得更柔软和光滑。

query_title_en: Suddenly got a scratch on my wrist.
query_title_zh: 手腕上突然出现一道划痕
query_content_en: There are only two small holes, so why is there a scratch? I don't know how this appeared. The photo is too blurry. The wound looks a bit moist and feels like salt has been sprinkled on it. Help.
query_content_zh: 他明明只有两个小洞为什么会有一个划痕呢呢，我都不知道我怎么出现在这个伤口(>﹏<)这手机拍照太辣了，我描述一下这个伤口有一些湿润的痕迹，然后有一种被盐洒上去的感觉，救命π_π

responses.content_en: Laceration appears superficial. No clear signs of infection. Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. If there is pus or spreading seek evaluation in urgent care
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤口似乎很浅。没有明显感染迹象。用肥皂水每曰清洗、并用干包扎物包好。如果有起脓或红肿现象便要到紧急护理诊所求诊。

query_title_en: It is a 2mm superficial wound. The skin is everted. Do I need the tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 两毫米外伤，皮肤外翻，需要打破伤风吗？
query_content_en: I fell into a cobstruction site. It was a deep wound.
query_content_zh: 摔在施工的土地里了，很深的口子

responses.content_en: Superficial abrasion of the forearm. OK to get tetanus shot given trauma sustained on construction site.
responses.content_zh: 前臂表面的擦伤。因为在建筑地盘受伤，应去接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Injured my finger, a piece of flesh is missing. What should I do? Urgent.
query_title_zh: 摔伤手指缺了一块肉，应该怎么办，急
query_content_en: It's been 10 days. The black flesh turned to yellow rotten flesh, but no new flesh is growing. I'm using Meibao burn ointment daily. How can I maximize healing and minimize scarring?
query_content_zh: 都10天了，黑肉变成了黄色的腐肉，但是一直没有长肉的症状，每天在涂美宝烫伤膏，请问怎么样才能最大程度上长好肉，尽量少留疤？

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water daily followed by ointment and covering with a bandage. You could also go see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和清水清洗，然后涂上药膏并用绷带覆盖。您也可以去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

query_title_en: Just asking, is the yellow liquid on my wound pus or exudate?
query_title_zh: 不懂就问，请问我这伤口上面黄色的液体是脓液还是组织渗出液？
query_content_en: Should I apply anything?
query_content_zh: 要不要涂些什么？

responses.content_en: The yellow liquid appears to be fluid from the normal healing process. Pus usually appears thicker and has a bad odor. No need to apply any ointment but consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, bleeding or pus.
responses.content_zh: 黄色的液体看起来像正常恢复的过程。 脓经常是更厚的并且伴有臭味。 你不需要涂任何药膏，但如果有出现像发烧，冷汗，恶心，呕吐，红肿，发热， 流血或流脓的症状，你就要去看医生

query_title_en: Is this wound infected? It was from a month ago, and still have not healed yet. Help urgently needed.
query_title_zh: 想问一下这个是伤口感染了吗？一个月前了一直不好，急急急
query_content_en: I fell a month ago when riding my bike. I have not healed ever since, and the wound does not hurt either. It only hurt when I touch it, and does not impact walking. Does someone with experience know if this is infected?
query_content_zh: 一个月以前骑车摔伤了，一直不好，伤口也不疼，只有碰一下才会疼，走路也不怎么影响，就是想问一下各位大佬这个是感染了嘛？

responses.content_en: Delayed wound healing and surrounding redness may suggest an infection. Recommend evaluation in urgent care for antibiotics. If antibiotics do not improve healing it may require debridement.
responses.content_zh: 伤口愈合延迟和周围红肿可能表示感染。建议前往急诊寻求评估并接受抗生素治疗。如果抗生素不能增进愈合，可能需要清创。

query_title_en: Injured my ankle.
query_title_zh: 脚踝受伤了
query_content_en: On the seventh day, the physician said that the skin might not heal well, and a skin graft might be needed later.
query_content_zh: 第七天的时候大夫说皮可能长不好，后期可能需要植皮

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital as the wound needs to be cleaned and a possible infection may need to be addressed with antibiotics
responses.content_zh: 建议你去最近的医院因为伤口看起来需要清理和可能性的感染或许需要抗生素

query_title_en: Pus under the scab.
query_title_zh: 结痂下化脓
query_content_en: Just asking, I can see yellow liquid under the scab when exposed to light, and the scab feels soft. Does this mean there's pus under the scab?
query_content_zh: 不懂就问，光照可以看见结痂下面🈶黄色液体，而且结痂摸起来是软的，这种是不是结痂下面化脓了

responses.content_en: Pus can be yellow in apperance but is thick in its texture. The yellow liquid you observe may also be due to a collection of fluid from the inflammation that occurs during the normal healing process. Consult a doctor if you have additional symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding as these may indicate an infection.
responses.content_zh: 脓液外观可能呈黄色，但质地较厚。您观察到的黄色液体也可能是由于在正常愈合过程中，炎症引起的液体积聚。如果出现其他症状，如发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血，这些可能表明感染，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Will the wound on my face leave a scar? What should I do?
query_title_zh: 脸上的伤口会留疤吗？怎么办
query_content_en: I accidentally got a wound on my face (as shown in the picture). Will it leave a scar? How can I prevent scarring? What medication should I use? What should I be careful of while eating? Is there anything else I should be aware of?
query_content_zh: 不小心脸上有个这样的伤口（如图）怎么办？会留下伤疤，或者疤痕么？要怎么注意才可以？我不想留疤痕，怎么办？要拿什么药？吃饭的时候注意什么？还有其他要注意的地方吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if a scar will form as it depends on how the body heals. Keep out of direct sunlight by wearing a hat and applying sunscreen for 6 months to prevent hyperpigmentation. You do not need to avoid any particular foods.
responses.content_zh: 是否会形成疤痕很难确定，这取决于身体的愈合情况。为了防止色素沉着，建议6个月内避免阳光直射，戴帽子并涂抹防晒霜。您不需要避免任何特定食物。

query_title_en: I got a small scratch from a rusty iron piece. Do I need a tetanus shot? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 被带铁锈的铁块划伤了一点点要不要打破伤风 伤口如图

responses.content_en: If the metal had rust on it recommend a tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果金属上有锈迹，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: How should I treat such a wound (warning: blood shown in the picture)?
query_title_zh: 这样的伤口怎么处理（晕血勿进.有图）
query_content_en: Details: While walking, I didn't see a wooden bench on the side and scratched my right knee about 10 cm below. It hurts a lot and bled a bit. Since it was late, I just put on a couple of band-aids and left it alone. Two days later, I took off the band-aids, and it looked like this (as shown in the picture). How should I treat this wound? Should I apply any ointment?
query_content_zh: 详情：走路的时候没看见边上有木凳.于是 右脚膝盖右侧下方大概10cm的地方就擦伤了...555.我觉得很痛，流了一些血、因为当时很晚了，所以我贴了两个创可贴就没管了...两天后打开创可贴是这样的，如图.....问题：如何处理这个伤口，是要擦什么药水吗？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a kitten. Do I need to get vaccinated? I have already cleaned the wound with soap and iodophor, as shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 被小猫抓了一下需要去打疫苗吗已经用肥皂和碘伏清理过了伤口如图

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: As shown in the image, my thumb was cut, and had four stitchs. The stitches was removed 14 days after the day of injury, and I have been wrapping it throughout this time, and reapplied medicaitons. The wound was not red during dressing change, but there was edematous, and now the thumb is unable to bend. Is this concerning? The injury occured 11/16 and suture removed on the 30th, at what date will it be healed and able to bend?
query_content_zh: 如图 我大拇指肚位置被割伤，缝了4针，受伤14天拆的线，期间一直在包扎，也换过药，换药时伤口不红，但有水肿，现在大拇指不能弯曲，请问有事吗？ 11月16号弄伤的30号拆的线，请问几号可以长好并且弯曲？

responses.content_en: If the swelling is new, that may be concerning. I would recommend that you consult a doctor for further evaluation. It may take up weeks for you to regain functions such as bending but if you do not, see your Primary Care doctor to obtain a referral to Occupational Therapy.
responses.content_zh: 如果肿胀是新的情况可能需要关注。我建议您咨询医生进行进一步评估。恢复如手指弯曲等功能可能需要几周时间，但如果没有恢复，建议您看您的初级保健医生，以转诊职业治疗。

query_content_en: Two months ago, I scraped my ankle while riding an electric bike, as shown in picture one. During the healing process, I scratched the wound with my hand. It has been two months and it hasn't healed yet, as shown in pictures two and three. It's also very itchy. Applying Dermovate seems to help a bit. What could be the issue?
query_content_zh: 我在两个月前骑电动车蹭到脚脖，如图一，然后伤口愈合过程中用手扣过伤口，现在两个月了，还没好，如图二.三，而且还特别痒，现在用皮炎平抹抹会好一点，请问这是怎么回事？？

responses.content_en: The wound is healing and does not appear infected. Itching at the wound site is common.
responses.content_zh: 伤口正在愈合，且看起来没有感染。伤口处的瘙痒是常见的现象。

query_title_en: My fingernail is injured like this. Will it grow back normally, or will there always be a gap? As shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 手指甲伤成这样，还能长好吗？还是以后都会有一个缺口？如图

responses.content_en: The finger nail will grow back but can take 4-6 months.
responses.content_zh: 指甲会重新长出来，但可能需要4-6个月的时间。

query_title_en: It's been two months since I got injured, and the wound is still quite red. Can I apply makeup now? (as shown in the picture)
query_title_zh: 受伤两个月了，现在伤口挺红。可以化妆了嘛，如图

responses.content_en: OK to apply makeup.
responses.content_zh: 可以化妆。

query_title_en: I slammed to kill a mosquito, and the mosquito's blood is on my hand. My hand has a wound. Will I be infected with things like AIDS. Image showned.
query_title_zh: 拍死一只蚊子 蚊子的血都弄在手上了 手上有伤口 会不会感染艾滋病什么的 如图

responses.content_en: HIV cannot be transmitted by mosquitos. Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 艾滋病病毒不能通过蚊子传播。每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: My palm was cut by glass, and this is ten days since the stitch was removed. Does the wound in the image appear normal? There are some ripping pain at the wound when I open my hand.  How should I help it to heal and how long does it take?
query_title_zh: 手掌玻璃割伤拆线10天，伤口恢复如图正常吗？现手掌用力张开伤口有撕裂痛感，应该如何恢复，多久可恢复

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing but can take up to 4-8 weeks. You can take pain medication and avoid carrying heavy objects or activities that cause pain at the site.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来正在愈合，但可能需要4到8周时间。您可以服用止痛药，并避免搬重物或进行导致伤口部位疼痛的活动。

query_content_en: I accidently scraped my knee last week, and it then form a scab. It still hurts a little, and the current state is shown in the image. The  wound is fully dried and scabbed, but there seems to have a little yellow spot in the middle. Is this infected? If so, what should I do? Do I need to peel of the scab?
query_content_zh: 上周膝盖不小心擦伤 后来结痂了 但是还是有点疼 现在样子如图 伤口完全干燥结痂 但是好像中间有一点黄色？请问这是感染了吗？ 如果是的话怎么处理？ 把结痂扣掉吗？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Do not remove the scab. Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。不要去除结痂。每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: After removing the stitches, the wound has expanded and turned red for a month and a half. What should I do? Is this hyperplasia?
query_title_zh: 拆线后一个半月伤口扩大发红,怎么办?是增生吗?
query_content_en: I had mole removal surgery, and after stitching, there was only one line. However, after the stitches were removed, the wound gradually felt like it was getting larger. It's been over a month since the stitches were removed, as shown in the picture. Is this hyperplasia? There's no protrusion. How should I treat it???
query_content_zh: 做了祛痣手术，缝合后也就一条，但拆线后伤口慢慢的就感觉越来越大的样子了，现在距离拆线一个多月了，如图，请问是增生吗？没有突出，应该怎么处理？？？

responses.content_en: The scar is remodelling and will continue to do so for 1.5 years. Over theis time the scar will soften and fade.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕正在重塑，这个过程将持续约1.5年。在此期间，疤痕会逐渐软化和淡化。

query_content_en: A Border Collie, not yet three months old, has already received two vaccinations. While playing, it accidentally bit my hand a little. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine? The wound is shown in the picture. Please provide professional advice.
query_content_zh: 三个月没到的边牧，打了两针疫苗了，玩我手不小心被咬到了一点点，我要去打狂犬疫苗吗？伤口如图请专业的讲解下

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: An elder accidently injured their hand. What should be done for treatment? Is the tetanus shot needed. Image shown.
query_title_zh: 老人不小心弄伤手了要怎么处理好，要不要打破伤风，如图？
query_content_en: Image attached.
query_content_zh: 如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with a dry dressing. Tetanus shot needed if injured with rusty object.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。如果是被生锈的物体弄伤，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: My finger was scratched by an embroidery needle, causing a bit of bleeding. The needle had a bit of rust, and the wound is 1-2 mm long. Do I need a tetanus shot? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 手指被绣花针划了一下，出了点血，针有一点锈，伤口1～2毫米，需要打破伤风吗？伤口如图

responses.content_en: You should get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years given the type of injury.
responses.content_zh: 基于伤口类型，如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Question, my finger was burned by boiling water. Now there is some white spotting, what should I do? Image attached. Thanks!
query_title_zh: 请教高手，手指被开水烫伤，出现白斑，该怎么办？如图，非常感谢

responses.content_en: The white area is likely due to the overlying skin starting to slough off. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic cream and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 白色区域可能是表层皮肤开始脱落所致。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: I have a question. I had a large surface scarpe wound, and the scar was formed. In this case, was it infected underneath the scar? If it is infected, will it affect the bone?
query_title_zh: 请问大面积擦伤后，伤口结痂，这种情况里面是感染了吗，如果感染了，会伤到骨头吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if there is an infection. If you are concerned about a bone infection, I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 是否有感染很难确定。如果您担心骨骼感染，我建议您去医院进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Will I get tetanus?
query_title_zh: 我会得破伤风吗？
query_content_en: As shown in the picture... I know the wound is small and shallow, but I don't know how it happened, which makes me uneasy (very anxious). Maybe my anxiety tendency is severe... The main point is, I don't know what caused it.
query_content_zh: 如图……我知道伤口很小而且很浅 但是我不知道是怎么弄的总是不怎么安心（十分焦虑）也许我的焦虑倾向严重……重点是 我不知道是什么东西弄去的

responses.content_en: Tetanus shot not needed.
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: Should I get a tetanus shot for this scratch? I was wearing socks when I got scratched, and the wound seems quite deep, as shown in the picture. Should I get vaccinated? Could someone who understands medicine advise?
query_content_zh: 求教被划伤需要打破伤风吗？当时穿着袜子被划伤的，伤口应该比较深，如图，不知道需不需要打，求懂医的人指点

responses.content_en: Recommend tetanus shot if cut with rusty object.
responses.content_zh: 如果是被生锈的物体割伤，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: A wound on my calf.
query_title_zh: 小腿伤口
query_content_en: A few days ago, I fell and hit my leg, resulting in a wound. Now, the wound looks like this (as shown in the picture). My family says it's fine, but it feels tight and painful when I walk, and I can't straighten my leg. How is the wound now? Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 前两天跌倒，前面被撞出一个伤口，现在伤口如图，家人说没问题，但我走起路来感觉又绷又疼，腿也无法伸直，请问现在伤口到底怎么样了，有没有发炎？

responses.content_en: The wound appears infected. Recommend evaluation for cleaning wound and antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来感染了。建议进行评估，清理伤口并使用抗生素。

query_title_en: After having a corn removed, a hard, white lump appeared near the wound, unlike a corn, but it hurts when I walk. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 做了鸡眼手术后，伤口附近出现出现如图硬硬的白色硬块，不像鸡眼，但走路会疼。我该怎么办？

responses.content_en: This may be hypertrophic skin after the surgery or a plantar wart. Recommend evaluation by dermatology.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是手术后的增生性皮肤或跖疣。建议去皮肤科进行评估。

query_title_en: My foot was scraped by a rusty steel bar, as shown in the picture. The wound is about 1mm deep. Should I get a tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 脚被生锈的钢筋剐破了，如图，伤口深度大概1mm左右，要不要打破伤风？

responses.content_en: Tetanus short recommended
responses.content_zh: 建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Is it okay not to get a shot after being bitten by a dog? (as shown in the picture)
query_title_zh: 被狗狗咬了不打针行吗 如图

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: A week ago, my finger was pricked by a key near the joint below my right middle finger. Why does everything above the wound still feel numb and have no sensation when touched? The wound has mostly healed, but the numbness persists. What's going on? Will it get better? I would appreciate input from professionals or anyone who has experienced this. I'm really worried! (As shown in the picture, the wound is small but was caused by the key teeth. The area above the wound marked with a white line feels numb and swollen when touched. I can move my finger normally, and pressing hard returns normal blood flow. However, it feels numb to the touch.)
query_content_zh: 我的手指一周前，被钥匙扎伤，右手中指下方关节内侧！为什么伤口以上到现在都是木木的，摸上去没有感觉！现在伤口基本愈合但是感觉还是木木的！这是怎么回事呀？会好吗？麻烦请专业的医生或者同样经历的朋友帮我回答！心里好害怕！（如图所示，伤口不大，被钥匙齿扎进去了，伤口以上画白线区域内木木的，用手触摸感觉木木的胀胀的。可以正常屈伸，使劲按压后可以正常回血！就是摸起来木木的！）

responses.content_en: The nerves of the finger run along both sides of the finger. The trauma may have bruised the nerve resulting in numbness. This generally improves with time.
responses.content_zh: 神经沿着手指两侧分布。创伤可能导致神经挫伤，进而引起麻木。这种情况通常会随着时间改善。

query_title_en: While removing tiles, I was scratched by a tile (the wound is shown in the picture, taken 3 hours after the injury). Will this lead to tetanus? Is iodine disinfection still effective after 3 hours?
query_title_zh: 卸瓷砖时，被瓷砖划伤（伤口如图，图中伤口为3小时之后的）会感染破伤风吗，3小时之后碘伏消毒还有用吗？

responses.content_en: No need for tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: It's been more than ten days since the burn. I need to go out. Can I wear socks now? The situation is as shown in the picture
query_title_zh: 烫伤十几天了，有事要出门，可以穿袜子了吗，情况如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It may be more comfortable to wear socks when the wound is completely healed.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口完全愈合后，穿袜子可能会更舒适。

query_content_en: What kind of medication should be applied for abrasions from a fall while cycling? Can red medicine (Mercurochrome) be used? Will it cause pain?
query_content_zh: 骑车跌倒擦伤要擦什么药？可以擦红药水吗？会不会咬到伤口很疼如图的擦伤要嚓什么药？擦红药水会不会很疼

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: My own Golden Retriever scratched my skin and broke it, as shown in the picture. I treated the wound with iodine. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 被自己家金毛抓破点皮，如图。用碘伏处理过伤口，需要打狂犬疫苗吗？

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: My finger was scratched by the metal handle of an umbrella. The wound isn't large or deep, as shown in the picture. There's a scratch on the side of the middle and ring fingers of my left hand, and the outer skin of the ring finger has been scraped off. There was a little bleeding. However, it happened in the morning while I was in class and the nursing room was closed, so I only squeezed out some blood and didn't clean it, just used a band-aid. I cleaned it later in the afternoon at home and then disinfected it with povidone-iodine. Since I waited a while and there seems to be rust on the umbrella handle, I'm worried about infection. Also, can I use a band-aid in a situation like mine? Please help me, thank you!
query_content_zh: 手指被铁的雨伞柄刮伤，伤口不大不深，如图，左手中指和无名指的指甲侧面各有一道，无名指的被挂掉了外面的皮，食指的也不太深。    流了一点血。但是当时是上午还在上课，医务室也没开门，所以只挤了一些血出来，也没有清洗，用了创可贴。    等下午回家后才清洗，然后用络合碘消毒。    因为拖的时间比较长而且伞柄上好像有锈，所以担心会不会感染?  还有，像我这样可以用创可贴吗?  请大家帮帮我，谢谢！

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_content_en: I want to consult a doctor. I had the stitches below my knee removed the night before last, and the recovery status of the wound is as shown in the picture. When can I go swimming? It's urgent because I am a swimming coach and need to get back to the work next month. Can I go into the water now?
query_content_zh: 我想请教一下医生，我膝盖下部前天晚上拆的线，伤口恢复状况如图。想问一下我大概什么时候可以下水游泳呢很急，因为是游泳教练，下个月得下水，想问下我现在可不可以下水了？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Clean with soap and water daily. Wait until wound if fully covered with skin before swimming.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。每天用肥皂和水清洗。等到伤口完全被皮肤覆盖后再游泳。

query_content_en: Today, while bathing my cat, I got scratched by him. The wound is as shown in the picture. I vaccinated him about a year ago (it's been almost a year, just a month or two short. Also not sure if the vaccine was legitimate). I have two questions: first, am I at risk of getting rabies? Second, does the cat need to get vaccinated again? Please provide accurate answers. Thank you!
query_content_zh: 今天给猫洗澡的时候被他抓了，伤口如图。大概一年前给他打过疫苗（没到一年，差一两个月。另外不知道打）今天给猫洗澡的时候被他抓了，伤口如图。大概一年前给他打过疫苗（没到一年，差一两个月。另外不知道打的疫苗是否正宗）。问题有两个：一个是我会不会得狂犬病？一个是猫是否又要注射疫苗？回答要求准确，谢谢！

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: Fell off an electric bike accidentally, and a small piece of flesh came off my chin. The wound is as shown in the picture. Approximately how long will it take to scab over? How long until it fully heals? Will it leave a scar? Could any experts tell me?
query_content_zh: 骑电车不小心摔倒下巴掉了一小块肉，伤口如图，请问这样子大概多久能结痂？多久才能完全愈合？会不会留疤？有什么注意事项？？求大神(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)

responses.content_en: The wound will scab within a week and take up to two months to completely heal. The scar will continue to remodel for a year and soften/fade over time.
responses.content_zh: 伤口将在一周内结痂，可能需要长达两个月才能完全愈合。疤痕将在一年内继续重塑，并随着时间逐渐软化和淡化。

query_title_en: A dog bit me, the skin isn't broken, but there are blood marks as shown in the picture. It has been disinfected. Should I get a rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 被狗狗咬了皮没破，但是有血痕，如图，已消毒，要去打狂犬病疫苗吗？

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬病疫苗。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, this wound extends to the heel. Is there a tendon involved? Sometimes it feels like something is being pulled, and it's quite painful. There's some swelling too. The other foot seems to have the same structure.
query_title_zh: 如图，这个伤口到脚跟那有筋吗。有时感觉有条拉着，很痛？会有点肿，看另一只脚好像有。

responses.content_en: The scar tissue and swelling may be afffecting the muscle function. If there is decrease in function in muscles in the lower leg or foot the tendon may be involved. MRI would be necessary to assess for tendon integrity.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕组织和肿胀可能影响肌肉功能。如果小腿或脚的肌肉功能下降，可能涉及到肌腱问题。需要进行MRI检查以评估肌腱的完整性。

query_title_en: Does it look like a dog scratch in the image.
query_title_zh: 如图像不像被狗狗抓了的痕迹？
query_content_en: What does a dog scratch look like on an image. Does image 1 seem like a dog scratch? Picture 2,3,4 is taken on the feet this morning, unclear if the dog has scratch the kid. But there were marks, and the one on the hand seemed to be from scratch on the mat, but I am not sure what has happened. Can someone take a look for me?
query_content_zh: 被狗狗抓了的图片是什么样子的  图一像像狗抓的吗  图二三四是脚上的今早不确定是不是狗狗抓了小孩  但是有痕迹  手上的像凉席刮得  但又不确定到底是什么样的   大家帮我参考一下

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_content_en: This afternoon at 1pm, I was scratched by my cat as shown in the image. It was not bleeding, and I cleansed the wound with soap immediatly. It have been more than an hour, the wound does not appear to have any abnormalities as shown in the photo. The wound is not that big, but for the purpose of cleansing, I peeled off some of the usperficial layer of the wound. Is it necessary to get shots? Are there anything to consider? The cat is only few month old, as shown in the image. It typically eats sausage, egg yolk and etc, and the cat has not been injured or bitten by other cats or dogs. PS., the wound is only the small dot at the finger tip, one of the image have a large wound at the finger top because I scartched myself with a nail. I have disinfected with iodine, please dont mistaken this as the cat scratch.
query_content_zh: 我今天下午一点左右，被养的小猫爪子挂了一下，如图，没出血，立即用肥皂清洗了伤口，一个多小时了，伤口处也没什么异常，如图，其实伤口没这么大，是为了清洗，把口表面一些皮撕掉了，请问有必要打针或者有什么需要注意的吗？猫咪是几个月的那种，如图，平时吃火腿肠鸡蛋黄之类，猫咪也没受过伤或者被别的猫狗咬过。PS伤口就只有指尖那个小点，其中有张图指头中间那一个大口子是前天晚上被钉子刮的，上午碘酒消过毒的，不要误以为是猫挠的。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you get a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, pain, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果你上次接种破伤风疫苗已经有5年了，我建议你再接种一次。如果出现发烧、寒战、恶心、呕吐、疼痛、发热、红肿、出血或脓样分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: There is a red dot on a few of my finger, which seems like there is a needle size wound at the skin. Can someone help me to take a look? Image as shown.
query_title_zh: 有几个手指上有一个红点，看着就像肉在皮内有一个针头一样大小的伤口，请各位帮我看一下，如图

responses.content_en: They may be blood vessels called capillaries under the skin. No concerns at this time.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是皮肤下的毛细血管。目前无需担心。

query_title_en: Why doesn't my thumb injury bleed but not hurt (as shown in the picture)?
query_title_zh: 为什么我大拇指受伤流血却不会痛（如图）？

responses.content_en: This is a superficial wound. There will be minimal bleeding and pain.
responses.content_zh: 这是表浅伤口，出血和疼痛会很轻微。

query_title_en: Could a wound like this (as shown in the picture) be caused by a dog bite?
query_title_zh: 这样子的伤口会不会是被狗咬成这样的？
query_content_en: First of all, to those who mindlessly push for vaccinations, I won’t be accepting those answers, thank you. Whether to get vaccinated is my own decision, so read the question carefully. The dog is still alive but has only been around for three days. Specific situation: three days ago in the afternoon, I was petting a stray dog at school when another stray dog (which has been around our school for a long time, an adult) bit my calf. It didn’t hurt and I felt nothing, so I think it didn't use any force. In the evening while washing my feet, I found four scabbed spots on my leg (as shown in the picture). Could it be from the dog bite? (I doubt a dog's teeth would cause such small spots.) Previously, I went to a Sichuan pepper forest and suspect it might be from the pepper plant thorns. The four spots are in a neat line... It shouldn't be from the dog, right? Please help identify.
query_content_zh: 【先说明，某些无脑推销打疫苗的亲，回答了我也不给采纳的谢谢【打不打是我自己的事，看清楚问题【狗现在还活着，不过也只有三天时间具体情况：三天前的下午，在学校摸一只流浪狗的时候被另外一条流浪狗（在我们学校流浪很久了，成年的）咬了一下小腿，不痛，没什么感觉，我感觉可能它压根没用力。晚上洗脚的时候，发现腿上四个点，而且已经结痂了。。。如图，会是被狗咬的吗？（感觉狗的牙齿应该不会造成那么小的点吧）之前去过花椒林，我自己怀疑是不是被花椒苗的刺给扎的。四个点很整齐的一排啊...应该不是狗吧，求鉴定。。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be from a dog bite.
responses.content_zh: 看起来不像是狗咬的伤口。

query_title_en: I fell from biking yesterday, and my leg was injured. As shown in the image, I did some basic cleansing, what should I do afterward.
query_title_zh: 昨天骑自行车摔了，腿摔坏了，如图，进行了简单清理，之后怎么办

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a cat, and the wound looks like this. It didn't bleed (as shown in the picture).
query_title_zh: 被猫抓伤了 伤口如图没有出血
query_content_en: This wound was caused by a scratch from my cat one month ago.
query_content_zh: 家里的猫，一个月

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: Does this wound need a tetanus shot, as shown in the picture?
query_title_zh: 这个伤口需要打破伤风针吗，如图所示

responses.content_en: You should get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: As shown in the image, I just got bitten by my 1 year old Chiwawa (scratched by the teeth when at play). Will I get rabies? Do I need the rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 如图：刚刚被自己家养的1岁吉娃娃犬咬伤（打闹的时候被牙齿划到） 会不会得狂犬病？需要打狂犬病针？
query_content_en: Patient information: female. Note: When I purchased the dog, the dog was vaccinated with rabies.
query_content_zh: 患者信息：女补充：我家狗狗买来的时候打过狂犬病预防针

responses.content_en: No rabies shot necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: Regarding wound inquiry.
query_title_zh: 有关伤口问题
query_content_en: Regarding a wound inquiry: my heel got scraped by a cart, resulting in a cut about 3 cm long, as shown in the picture. At first, I thought it was just a scrape, but now the wound has sunken in. What’s going on? Does this need stitches? Will it heal flat afterwards?
query_content_zh: 有关伤口问题脚后跟被推车蹭可以下，大概3公分长的口子，如图，一开始以为是破皮，现在伤口凹下去了，怎么回事？这个需要缝针么？之后会长平么？

responses.content_en: No stitches are necessary. The wound will take 4-6 weeks to heal and will flatten over time.
responses.content_zh: 不需要缝合。伤口可能需要4-6周才能愈合，并会随着时间逐渐变平。

query_title_en: After a dog bite, besides the rabies vaccine, is the rabies antiserum needed?
query_title_zh: 被狗咬伤除了注射狂犬疫苗还需要注册抗狂犬病血清吗？
query_content_en: Patient information: female, 54 years old, Fujian, Xiamen. Illness description (onset of illness, main symptoms): In the morning, my mother was bitten by a small dog on the anterior side of foot joint. The image shows the specific condition. (there seems to have some bruising inside). After being bitten, we went to the hospital immediatly and cleased the wound, and received the first rabies shot. Is the rabies antiserum shot also needed? What kind of help needed: What should we take consideration for the next few days? For example, any living or diet considerations?
query_content_zh: 患者信息：女 54岁 福建 厦门 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：早上我妈被一只小狗咬伤了脚的关节内侧，具体伤情如图（实际里面似乎还有瘀青），被咬伤后马上去了医院处理了伤口并注射了第一支狂犬疫苗，请问还需要注射抗狂犬病血清吗？想得到怎样的帮助：请问最近几天要注意什么？比如说生活起居和饮食方面？

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily. Consider antibiotics for animal bites. Follow hospital instructions regarding rabies vaccination schedule.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口。动物咬伤时可考虑使用抗生素。遵循医院狂犬疫苗接种时间表的指示。

query_title_en: I got a blister from exercising a couple of days ago, as shown in the picture. Can I take a shower or exercise? How can I make it heal faster?
query_title_zh: 我前两天运动时脚磨破了皮，如图，请问能洗澡运动吗？怎么消下去？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with dry dressing. You can exercise and shower as normal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥敷料覆盖。您可以正常运动和洗澡。

query_title_en: My finger was bitten by a cat, and the wound is as shown in the picture. It has been bleeding slightly, but the cat café owner said the cat is vaccinated, so there's no need to worry. Should I get vaccinated?
query_title_zh: 手指被猫咪咬伤了，大小如图，一直少量出血，但是猫咖店家说猫咪打了疫苗不用担心。我应该去打疫苗吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care as you may also need antibiotics to prevent infection and get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years given the type of injury.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心，因为您可能需要抗生素来预防感染，如果您的破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，也建议接种破伤风疫苗，鉴于伤口类型。

query_content_en: When I was 18, I had a car accident that left me with a scar, as shown in the picture. I have a tendency to form scars. If I get plastic surgery, will it leave no marks and make my skin look like it did before?
query_content_zh: 我18岁出了车祸，破了相，后来如图，有了个肉蕾，我是疤痕体质，如果整形，会不留痕迹和以前皮肤一样平吗？

responses.content_en: You can consult a plastic surgeon for scar revision. If you are prone to developing keloid scars there is no guarantee that the skin will leave no marks.
responses.content_zh: 您可以咨询整形外科医生进行疤痕修复。如果您容易形成瘢痕疙瘩，无法保证皮肤不会留下痕迹。

query_title_en: Do I need a shot for a dog scratch? The wound size is shown in the picture. Please let an expert take a look.
query_title_zh: 被狗抓伤要打针吗？有图，伤口大小如图。请专家看看

responses.content_en: No rabies shot necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: Can anyone advise on how to treat this wound? I applied a bandage during the day, and when I removed it after finishing work at midnight, it looked like this.
query_title_zh: 大家帮我看一下这样的伤口还能怎么处理呢？白天的时候贴了止血贴，十二点下班后揭开就成了这个样子的了？
query_content_en: Is it okay to apply red medicine and anti-inflammatory powder on the wound? The wound is still oozing fluid and sticking to my pants. There's also a smell.
query_content_zh: 现在涂上了红药和消炎粉墨行吧？还会流液体粘在裤子上喔？还有一股味道？

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: Will wound like this be infected with tetanus?
query_title_zh: 请问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？
query_content_en: Will wound like this be infected with tetanus? It was injured by an iron sheet, and a layer of skin was scraped off, bleeding. The diameter is 5mm, treated with hydrogen peroxide for three times, and it had been 24 hours. Image as shown.
query_content_zh: 请问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？被铁皮划破，掉了一层皮，出血，直径5mm，用双氧水处理了3次，已过24小时。如图所示！！！

responses.content_en: If the metal had rust on it recommend a tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果金属上有锈迹，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: There is a wound on the palm of my hand that won't heal.
query_title_zh: 手心有一伤口不能愈合。
query_content_en: Patient Information: Male, 32 years old, Shijiazhuang, Hebei. Condition description (time of onset, main symptoms, etc.): There has been a wound on my palm for about two years, and I don't know how it happened. The wound doesn't hurt or itch. Usually, I don't notice it, but it turns white and swells when exposed to water. What is causing this problem, and how should it be treated? Previous treatments and any history of allergies or hereditary diseases: None. (as shown in the picture)
query_content_zh: 患者信息：男 32岁 河北 石家庄 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：大约两年了，手心上有一伤口，不知道是如何产生的。伤口不疼不痒，平时没有注意，着水后周围皮肤发白胀大。想得到怎样的帮助：请问这是什么问题，是什么原因造成的，应当如何治疗？曾经治疗情况及是否有过敏、遗传病史：无如图

responses.content_en: There may be a foreign body in the wound that prevents it from healing. Recommend consulting a physician for examination.
responses.content_zh: 伤口内可能有异物，导致愈合受阻。建议咨询医生进行检查。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, I fell off my bike. The previous wound didn't break the skin but it's bleeding. How should I handle it?
query_title_zh: 如图，骑自行车摔倒，以前的伤口没破皮但是出血了，怎么处理

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: How to treat a cut wound from eye glasses. Wound is shown in image attached
query_title_zh: 眼镜划伤的伤口如何处理 伤口如图
query_content_en: as shown in the image
query_content_zh: 如图

responses.content_en: Recommend Urgent Care evaluation for stitches since it is over a joint and can continue to bleed with movement
responses.content_zh: 建议去急诊中心评估是否需要缝合，因为伤口位于关节处，移动时可能会持续出血。

query_title_en: The ankle was previously scraped and hasn't healed until now, as shown in the picture. The area around it still feels hard internally. Can anyone advise?
query_title_zh: 脚踝处原来擦伤，至今未能痊愈，如图，周围还内部还很硬，请教各位！
query_content_en: Additional pictures: None!
query_content_zh: 补充图片 没有！

responses.content_en: The surrouding tissue can be hard due to the healing process but should flatten over time. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, bleeding, redness, warmth, pain or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 由于愈合过程，周围组织可能变硬，但应随时间过去逐渐平坦。如果出现发热、发冷、恶心、呕吐、出血、红肿、发热、疼痛或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: It's been over ten days since the burn. Can I wear socks now? The situation is as shown in the picture
query_title_zh: 烫伤十几天了，有事要出门，可以穿袜子了吗？情况如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. Open toed shoes may be more comfortable until the wound is completely healed.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。穿露趾鞋可能会更舒适，直到伤口完全愈合。

query_title_en: How can I prevent a scar from forming after a fall? I fell while walking my dog today, resulting in the wound shown in the picture. Because it's on my hand, I'm quite concerned.
query_title_zh: 摔倒了怎么不会留疤 我今天遛狗的时候摔了一下，然后如图了。。。因为是手 我比较在意。。。
query_content_en: Patient Information: Female. How can I prevent a scar after a fall? I fell while walking my dog today, resulting in the wound shown in the picture. Because it's on my hand, I'm quite concerned. Will it leave a scar?
query_content_zh: 患者信息：女 摔倒了怎么不会留疤   我今天遛狗的时候摔了一下，然后如图了。。。因为是手  我比较在意。。。就是这样了。。。会不会落疤啊、、、、

responses.content_en: The scar will continue to remodel for a year and soften/fade over time. You cannot control whether a hypertrophic scar forms.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕将在一年内继续重塑，并随着时间逐渐软化和淡化。您无法控制是否会形成增生性疤痕。

query_title_en: The wound has become like this (as shown in the picture), how should I treat it? Please advise.
query_title_zh: 伤口变成这样（如图）该怎么处理？求解答

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: I have a burn on the back of my hand. Do I need to go to the hospital? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 手背烫伤了 需要去医院吗 如图
query_content_en: got burned the night before last, and I've been applying burn ointment these past two days.
query_content_zh: 前天晚上被烫的 这两天都有涂烫伤药

responses.content_en: Keep clean daily with soap and water. If the blister pops keep covered with dry bandage. No hospital evaluation necessary.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洁。如果水泡破了，继续用干燥的绷带覆盖。无需去医院评估。

query_title_en: Seeking for advice! Six months ago, I got a piece of skin on my shoulder scraped off while working at a construction site. I assumed the wound would heal on its own. As a result, after the wound healed, it swelled up (as shown in the picture).
query_title_zh: 求救，本人半年前在工地做事肩膀被磨破了一块皮，自认为伤口会愈合结果伤口愈合之后肿起来了（如图）
query_content_en: Help needed! Six months ago, I got a piece of skin on my shoulder scraped off while working at a construction site. I assumed the wound would heal on its own and didn't take care of it. As a result, after the wound healed, it swelled up (as shown in the picture) and hasn't subsided. When I press it, it still hurts. I'm asking for help and suggestions from everyone. Thank you very much!
query_content_zh: 求救，本人半年前在工地做事肩膀被磨破了一块皮，于是我自认为伤口会愈合，没有去管它，结果伤口愈合之后肿起来了（如图），一直消不下来，用手摁一下还会疼，求助各位大爷给小弟帮帮忙提点建议，万分感谢

responses.content_en: This is a keloid scar. Recommend evaluation by dermatology.
responses.content_zh: 这是瘢痕疙瘩。建议去皮肤科进行评估。

query_title_en: Is this what a minor wound looks like after being bitten or scratched by a dog, as shown in the picture?
query_title_zh: 被狗咬伤或抓伤轻微伤口形状图是不是这个样子的啊如图所是

responses.content_en: Cannot determine mechanism of injury from photo.
responses.content_zh: 无法从照片中确定受伤的机制

query_content_en: I injured my knee by falling, as shown in the picture. Is it serious? How should I treat it? Disinfecting it isn't too painful, is it?
query_content_zh: 膝盖摔伤，如图，严重吗？？？请问怎么处理？ 消毒什么的不是很痛？？？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily. If it is difficult to bear weight on that leg consider Xray to rule out fracture.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。如果腿部难承重，建议进行X光检查以排除骨折可能。

query_title_en: I was bitten by a cat raised by a relative in the village. The wound looks like the one in the picture. I washed it with soap and water. Do I need an injection? The wound hurts a little.
query_title_zh: 被村里亲戚养的猫咬到了，伤口如图，用肥皂水洗过了，请问需要打针吗，伤口有点小疼

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: My middle finger was cut by a rusted stainless steel sheet, as shown in the image. It is about finger size deep, do I need to get the tetanus shot? Can I just disinfect it with iodine?
query_content_zh: 中指被生锈的不锈钢片划伤。如图。深的话手指一共也就那么点深。需要打破伤风吗。自己拿碘酒消毒下可以吗。

responses.content_en: Tetanus shot recommended
responses.content_zh: 建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: I cut my finger while chopping vegetables, as shown in the picture. Do I need to go to the clinic for bandaging and disinfection, or can I handle it myself?
query_title_zh: 切菜切到手指了 伤口如图 需要去诊所包扎消毒吗 还是自己随便弄弄

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_content_en: I urgently need help. I accidentally got scratched by a nail. The wound is not deep, and I've applied red medicine, as shown in the picture. Should I get a tetanus shot? I asked someone, and they said it costs several hundred yuan per shot. I’m a worker and can't afford it. For such a shallow wound, is it okay not to get a tetanus shot?
query_content_zh: 急需求救，我刚才手不小心被铁钉划伤了，伤口不深，现在涂了红药水，如图，这种情况要不要打破伤风啊，刚才问了别人说要好几百一针，我打工的没钱，这么浅的伤口不打破伤风应该没事吧？

responses.content_en: You should get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years given the type of injury.
responses.content_zh: 有鉴于伤口类型，如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: I was scratched by my cat at home, which is about four months old. The wound is shown in the picture. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine?
query_content_zh: 被家里养的猫抓伤了，猫应该有4个月了，伤口如图，需不需要打狂犬疫苗

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: I was bitten on the arm by my own cat, leaving a deep bite mark, as shown in the picture. What should I do? I am 15 years old.
query_title_zh: 我被自己加养的猫咬了胳膊，留下一个大牙印，如图，我会怎么样？我15岁

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with a dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_content_en: Hello everyone: Last month, I accidentally cut myself with a wire, causing a lot of bleeding, with a wound of average length. It looked like the picture. Initially, the wound was flat, but now it is swollen. What could this be? Will it get worse? Please advise.
query_content_zh: 大家好: 上个月我不小心被铁丝割了一点，出血多，一条的伤口长度一般。至今就出现如图这样，以前伤口没有什么 就平着，现在却肿起来了，请问这是怎么回事？ 会不会更严重？           希望大家采纳。

responses.content_en: This is a hypertrophic scar. It will continue to fade and flatten for 1.5 years.
responses.content_zh: 这是增生性疤痕。它将在1.5年内继续淡化并变平。

query_content_en: My foot was injured and needed eight stitches. Because of pus, the stitches at the front were removed, leaving a hole as shown in the picture. It has been ten days and still hasn't scabbed over. Can you tell if it's healing, and how can it heal faster?
query_content_zh: 脚碰破了 缝了八针 因为有脓 把前面线拆了 这地方是个洞 如图 十天了 还是没有结疤 能不能看出来在愈合 怎么能愈合快一点

responses.content_en: The tissue will heal from the bottom up and skin will eventually grow over it. Continue to clean daily with soap and water. It may take 2 months to heal.
responses.content_zh: 组织会从底部开始愈合，最终皮肤会长出来。继续每天用肥皂和水清洗。愈合可能需要2个月时间。

query_content_en: The surgical wound has become purulent. What caused this, and how should it be treated? The surgery was 10 days ago, as shown in the picture.
query_content_zh: 手术刀口化脓，什么原因，怎么治疗？如图手术后已经10天了

responses.content_en: The infection was likely caused by bacteria from the skin or from within. I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation as this may need to be drained and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 感染可能是由皮肤上的细菌或内部细菌引起的。我建议您去最近的医院进行进一步评估，因为可能需要接受引流与抗生素治疗。

query_title_en: Do I need to get a tetanus shot after being scratched by a nail?
query_title_zh: 被钉子划破需要打破伤风吗？
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, the wound doesn't seem very deep but is not superficial either. If a vaccine is not needed, how should I treat it? Should I rinse it with water? Personally, I feel the wound looks relatively clean.
query_content_zh: 如图，感觉不是很深，但也不算表皮了。如果不需要打，该怎么处理，用水冲吗。个人感觉伤口也还算干净

responses.content_en: If the nail had rust on it recommend tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果钉子上有锈迹，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, I got an abrasion and applied red medicine. Now, the area around the wound has turned black. Should I be worried?
query_title_zh: 如图，擦伤了涂了红药水之后变成这样了，伤口周围有一圈黑色的，有没有事的？

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water. The wound does not appear infected.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。伤口看起来没有感染。

query_content_en: In the morning, my thumb was cut by an iron buckle, and it bled a lot. At the time, I thought the wound was not deep, so I simply disinfected it and bandaged it. In the afternoon, it looked like this. Should I get stitches and a tetanus shot? Will it heal without deforming?
query_content_zh: 早上大指拇被铁扣板割了个口子，流了很多血，当时觉得伤口也不深，就简单消了下毒包了下，下午成这样了，请问下这种需不需要缝合和打破伤风，会不会长变形？

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation for stitches.
responses.content_zh: 建议进行评估，可能需要缝合。
